current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:

			 other purposes.

Nothing
			 in this section—

authorizes the
			 establishment of a regional joint outer Continental Shelf lease and permit
			 processing coordination office for the Gulf of Mexico region of the outer
			 Continental Shelf;

affects the
			 operation of any Federal or State law; or

affects any
			 delegation of authority made by the head of a Federal agency for employees
			 that
			 are assigned to a coordination office.
